name: A Stormy Night
description:
This is a project is an Overwatch-inspired diorama project for my Style and Sensibility Assignment.

In my final build, I found myself leaning towards building a darker atmosphere rather than Ireland's light and cheerful daytime capitals. In this project, I was trying to create a stormy day while enemy drones are on the mission to investigate the ongoing criminal activities between the two different sides of the cities. The boat sitting in the middle of the water caused a car crash is fleeting from the crime scene. I have put an over-dramatic red light over the ship to emphasize the tension and atmosphere of that glimpse of time. 

The assets from assignment 1 that I found complimentary to my project include: 

Bell Xavier's Fishing Boat (Hero Asset)

Madeleine Taylor's Barfront (Hero Asset)

Alby Mundy's Parking Pole (Standard Asset)

Andrew Krajko's Potato Bag (Standard Asset)

Andrew Krajko's Facade (Hero Asset)

Yakoub Abdulrahman's Payload (Hero Asset)

Josevan Danusastra Car (Hero Asset)

Sadie Coughlan's Outdoor Table (Standard Asset)

Shakira Clancy's Street Light (Standard Asset)

Nathan Fumberger Tree (Standard Asset)

My own ones from assignment 1:

Sausage Platter (Standard Asset)

Canned Beans (Standard Asset)

I have used 5 external assets in total, accessible and free in the Unity Asset Store and stated below:

Building Apartment – LowlyPoly

Fallen Tree - Professional 3D Captured Objects - Game Ready

Low poly combat drone - VoodooPlay

Monqo Egg (stools) – Monqo Studios

Rocks and Boulders pack – Manufactura K4
